CustomField.formula: IF ( SBQQ__Optional__c = TRUE, 0, IF( TEXT(SBQQ__PricingMethod__c) = "Cost", SBQQ__UnitCost__c * SBQQ__Quantity__c * CASE(Trans_Category__c, "Sub Rental", Sublease_Multiplier__c, "Sale", IF( SBQQ__Bundled__c = FALSE, 1, 0) , "Rental", 0 , "Rental Cost", 0, 1), 0))
CustomField.label: Total Non-Rental Cost excl Optional
